lab4

Class CalculationsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab4.CalculationsModel

  • public class CalculationsModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that deals with all the calculations based on the user input for the initial values. It contains calculation, getter, and setter methods
    Author:
    Sajid C.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CalculationsModel()
      Constructor to set the initial values for the variables for the number of payments, principal, and annualIntRate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double amorInYears()
      Calculates and returns the amortization expressed in years.
      double calcAvgIntMonth()
      A method that calculates and returns the average interest per month.
      double calcAvgIntYear()
      A method that calculates and returns the average interest paid per year.
      void calcBlendedPayment()
      A method that calculates the amount of the blended monthly payment and assigns it to a variable, using the respective formula.
      void calcInterestFactor(double compoundFreq, double paymentFreq)
      Given a double Compound Frequency and Payment Frequency, this method calculates the interest factor using the interest factor formula.
      void calcIntPrincipalRatio()
      Calculates the interest/principal ratio and assigns it to a variable.
      void calcTotalInterestAndPrincipal()
      Calculates the Total Interest and Principal and assigns it to a variable.
      void calcTotalInterestPaid()
      Calculates the Total interest paid over the length of the mortgage and assigns it t a variable.
      double getBlendedPayment() 
      double getInterestFactor() 
      double getIntPrincipalRatio() 
      double getTotalInterestAndPrincipal() 
      double getTotalInterestPaid() 
      void setAnnualIntRate(double intRate)
      Given a double representing the annual interest rate as a percent, this method divides it by 100 to ready it for calculations, and sets the respective instance variable in the class for further calculations
      void setNumPayments(double numOfPayments)
      Given a double representing the number of payments, this method sets the respective instance variable in this class for further calculations.
      void setPrincipal(double principal)
      Given a double representing the principal amount, this method sets the respective instance variable in this class for further calculations.

        Parameters:

      • setAnnualIntRate

        public void setAnnualIntRate(double intRate)
        Given a double representing the annual interest rate as a percent, this method divides it by 100 to ready it for calculations, and sets the respective instance variable in the class for further calculations
        Parameters:
        intRate - The annual interest rate the user enters.

      • calcInterestFactor

        public void calcInterestFactor(double compoundFreq,
                               double paymentFreq)
        Given a double Compound Frequency and Payment Frequency, this method calculates the interest factor using the interest factor formula.
        Parameters:
        compoundFreq - A double representing the frequency at which interest is compounded in a year.
        paymentFreq - A double representing the frequency at which payments are made in a year.
